contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=July 2009}} {{italictitle}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Xenosaurus'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Reptile|Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | familia = [[Xenosauridae]] | genus = '''''Xenosaurus''''' }} ''Xenosaurus'' is a [[lizard]] genus which belongs to the family of [[Xenosauridae]]. ==Classification== '''Genus ''Xenosaurus''''' *''[[Xenosaurus grandis]]'' *''[[Xenosaurus newmanorum]]'' *''[[Xenosaurus penai]]'' *''[[Xenosaurus phalaroantheron]]'' *''[[Xenosaurus platyceps]]'' *''[[Xenosaurus rectocollaris]]'' {{wikispecies}} {{commons category|Xenosauridae}} [[Category:Xenosaurids]] {{lizard-stub}}
